name: certiproof-x
description: Decentralized Proof Protocol - Open-source Web3 protocol for certifying digital proofs using blockchain, IPFS and cryptographic signatures

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy-contract: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:contracts
scripts.clean:
rmdir /s /q node_modules frontend
ode_modules backend
ode_modules contracts
ode_modules 2>nul || echo "Clean completed"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
